sentences.en: City development of Nagoya is a mirror of modern city planning.
sentences.cn: 名古屋的城市建设,现代城市规划的典范.

sentences.en: Each will be targeted at a particular government, and they will be asked to sign up to it before the meeting in Nagoya.
sentences.cn: 每一项任务均针对一个特定的政府，要求他们在名古屋召开会议之前将其签署。

sentences.en: Hopefully the agreement reached in Nagoya will change all that.
sentences.cn: 在名古屋达成的协议将有望改变这一切。

sentences.en: I just love the fall in Nagoya. The sky is always blue.
sentences.cn: 我很喜欢名古屋的秋, 天总是那么的蓝.

sentences.en: Jason: We went to Aichi in Nagoya.
sentences.cn: 杰森: 我们去名古屋的爱知.

sentences.en: Nagoya Institute of the commercial launch of a new design of the robot, " Rabbit Network. "
sentences.cn: 名古屋市商业设计研究所推出了新款机器人 “ 网络兔子 ”.

sentences.en: Nagoya is also beautiful for its Momiji, aka maple leaves in November.
sentences.cn: 名古屋的红叶也非常的美, 大约是在十一月份.
